activities: As per our privacy policies, our main company site collects contact information such as name, e-mail address, mailing address, phone number, country location, and information about the person’s business such as, company name. We use this information to respond to customer service requests, administer the account, send marketing communications,  We also collect customer and sales information via our CRM site. We use this information for sales leads and sales analysis.
